body.home: Hi! I'm a full stack developer specialised on the front-end, with a background in hospitality, retail and logistics, now focused on building digital experiences that matter.
body.home2-subtitle: ğŸŒ Frontend development (React, JavaScript, responsive design):
body.home2-paragraph: I build fast, responsive, and accessible websites using HTML, CSS, and modern JavaScript - with a strong focus on React and clean UI/UX
body.home2-subtitle2: ğŸ§  Backend APIs (Django REST, CRUD operations, authentication)
body.home2-paragraph2: I create robust backend applications and APIs using Django and Django REST Framework to handle data, logic and integrations.
body.home2-subtitle3: ğŸ› ï¸ Full project deployment (GitHub Pages, Heroku)
body.home2-paragraph3: From coding to deployment - I manage the full process using Git, GitHub, and platforms like Heroku or Github Pages.
body.home2-paragraph4: I optimize every project for speed, mobile responsiveness, and accessibility, ensuring a smooth user experience on any device.
